definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Jia welcomed King Gyanendra to the annual conference of the forum.
sentences.chinese: 贾庆林欢迎贾南德拉国王来华出席博鳌亚洲论坛年会。

sentences.english: Princess Anne visited China on September 20 at the invitation of the Foreign Ministry of China.
sentences.chinese: 安妮公主是应外交部邀请于20日来华访问的。

sentences.english: Come and see for yourself at Huangxing Clothes store!
sentences.chinese: 来华兴服装店为你自己来看一下。

sentences.english: Peter has experience in assisting foreign enterprises to invest in China.
sentences.chinese: 龚永德在协助国外企业来华投资的经验丰富。

sentences.english: Yang expressed welcome for Baird's visit and congratulated him for assuming his new office.
sentences.chinese: 杨洁篪欢迎贝尔德来华访问并祝贺其履新。

sentences.english: Li extended a welcome to Kabila for his visit and spoke highly of Sino-DRC relations.
sentences.chinese: 李鹏欢迎卡比拉来华访问，并积极评价中刚双边关系。

sentences.english: Mr. Wi Sung Lac, chief of the ROK delegation to the Six-Party Talks came to visit China today.
sentences.chinese: 六方会谈韩方代表团团长魏圣洛今天来华访问。

sentences.english: Chao acted as interpreter when Bertrand Russell took a lecture tour of China.
sentences.chinese: 当年英国哲学家罗素来华巡回讲学，赵元任担任翻译。

sentences.english: Days ago, there was a question about the itinerary of Guinean President Condé's visit to China.
sentences.chinese: 前几天有记者问及几内亚总统孔戴来华行程安排。

sentences.english: Cosgrove has been in China since last week on his first state visit.
sentences.chinese: 上周，科斯格罗夫来华进行首次国事访问。

sentences.english: The delegation pays the visit to China at the invitation of the Information Office of the State Council of China.
sentences.chinese: 代表团是应国新办邀请来华访问的。

sentences.english: To carry above-mentioned target is the purpose of Stilwell's arrival.
sentences.chinese: 史迪威来华是为实现上述目标服务。

sentences.english: Students resuming study should apply for X visa to come to China.
sentences.chinese: 来华自费留学生完成学业后由外事处颁发在学证明。

sentences.english: Applicants must have physical checkup before registration as a student in Guangxi Medical University.
sentences.chinese: 留学生来华前应认真进行体格检查。

sentences.english: It is Damo, an Indian monk, who introduced the traditional Dhyana in India into China.
sentences.chinese: 印度僧人达摩东渡来华，带来了印度传统的禅法。

sentences.english: As for the visit of Argentinean Foreign Minister, I haven't got any information yet.
sentences.chinese: 关于阿根廷外长来华事，目前我没有可以提供的信息。

definition: to go and visit in an official capacity or for investigation
to go/to visit (e.g. another country)/to attend (a banquet etc)
to return to one's home country
within China/during one's visit to China
the Chinese side (in an international venture)
to discuss a matter with sb/to get in touch with/to arrange
